name: iLearn: Alphabet for Preschoolers
description: This application is one of the iLearn series for learning letters, numbers, colors, shapes, sorting and more.  The application contains 5 fun and very educational sections which help the small kids to know the alphabet while enjoying: 1) Match the letter and images starts with the letters to its wooden shadow. 2) Letter Puzzles: create the letters from small pieces. 3) Match letters 4) Letters memory game 5) Letters tracing.  The application support 7 different languages: English, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, Arabic, German and French.  In addition to the above 2 sections, the application contains 3 different activities which also help the small kiddos learn the letters: 1) Fisherman: the kid is asked to fish the fish who have specific letters from an aquarium. 2) Bubbles The kids is asked to pop the bubbles which contain a specific letter.  And The application has a fun balloon popping activity so the small kids will have fun and time for rest while learning.  Adults can enjoy this app to learn letters in 7 different languages including English, Spanish and Arabic.  Enjoy!
